meanings.sent1: In mathematics, cohomologies help us understand shapes and spaces better.
meanings.sent2: Mathematicians use cohomologies to analyze the properties of geometric structures.
meanings.sent3: The cohomologies of the puzzle pieces revealed the hidden pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her exploration of cohomologies was like unraveling a complex web of information.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made cohomologies come alive by using colorful diagrams and charts.

meanings.definition: The cohomology groups of a topological space.
meanings.sent1: The cohomologies of the cave system helped map out its intricate passages.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cohomologies to study the connectivity of different regions in space.
meanings.sent3: The cohomologies of the ant colony surprised the researchers with their organized structure.
meanings.sent4: The cohomologies of the city resembled a complex network of roads and intersections.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the cohomologies of the mountain range made it easier to plan the hiking routes.
